授業目的: Communication happens everywhere. We talk to our friends, our parents, our teachers, and our dogs. We talk on the telephone. We talk face-to-face. Sometimes we talk a lot. Sometimes we do not talk. Communication and language are inevitable in our life. After taking this course, students will understand about how people communicate, how language shapes communication, and how language works.
到達目標: Students will gain an understanding of basic communication theory and intercultural communication. Students will also gain an understanding of basic linguistic theory and the current state of the world's languages.
授業方法:
Lectures will be given in English (occasionally supplemented by Japanese). LUNA will be used for both quizzes and the final exam.
